title: South Central Railway Junior Engineer, Jr. Translator & Stenographer Jobs Notification 2021 - 96 Vacancies
description: South Central Railway (SCR) has invited applications for the notification of Junior Engineer, Jr. Translator & Stenographer Jobs for 96 Vacancies. Interested aspirants who are qualified in 10+2, Diploma, B.E/ B.Tech, Post Graduation are eligible to apply for this South Central Railway Recruitment 2021.

title: Kerala PSC Assistant Engineer Jobs  2021 - 53 Vacancies
description: Kerala Public Service Commission (Kerala PSC) has announced the latest employment notification of Assistant Engineer Jobs for 53 Vacancies. Contenders who have completed their qualification in Diploma, Degree in Civil & Electrical Engineering are eligible to apply for this Kerala PSC Recruitment 2021.

title: KRCL Jr. Technical Assistant Jobs  2021 - 18 Vacancies
description: Konkan Railway Corporation Limited has advertised the Latest Recruitment Notification 2021 to fulfill the 18 Jr. Technical Assistant Vacancies. Candidates, who have a qualification of B.E/B.Tech in Electronics / Electrical & Electronics / Electronics & Telecommunication / Communication / Instrumentation are eligible. Interested candidates may attend an interview from 20th April 2021 to 23rd April 2021.

title: IIT Guwahati Project Engineer Jobs  2021 - 02 Vacancies
description: Indian Institute of Technology, Guwahati (IIT Guwahati) has released the latest job opportunities for the notification of Associate Project Engineer & Assistant Project Engineer Jobs for 02 Vacancies. Aspirants who are qualified in Bachelors Degree, Masters Degree in relevant Engineering are eligible to apply for this IIT Guwahati Recruitment 2021. Aspirants who want to work as an employee in govt sector department can grab this career opportunity by applying before 19th April 2021.

title: NCRTC Surveyor, Managers, electrical engineer jobs 2021 - 24 Vacancies
description: National Capital Region Transport Corporation (NCRTC) has advertised the latest recruitment notification of Surveyors, Manager, Inspector & Other Jobs for 24 Vacancies. Contenders who have completed their qualification in Any Degree, Post Graduation, Diploma, B.E/ B.Tech, ITI are eligible to apply for this NCRTC Recruitment 2021. Hopefuls who have the desire to get placed in the public sector jobs must take the chance to apply for this recruitment drive before 23rd April 2021.

title: Electrical Engineer/ Structural Engineer
description: This post was most recently updated on April 3rd, 2021KIOCL Recruitment 2021 | Available Electrical Engineer, Civil/ Structural Engineer & Other Posts | Total Vacancies 16 | KIOCL Registration Date & Application Proces KIOCL Recruitment Applications are invited from KIOCL Karnataka in prescribed form through online mode only for various Assistant posts. The direct link for the online application portal is available at the KIOCL website scr.indianrailways.gov.in. KIOCL has already published the employment notice on 20.03.2021 regarding 16 vacancies. As per the KIOCL vacancy notification, these vacancies are assigned to Electrical Engineer, Civil/ Structural Engineer & Other and post wise vacancy details are given below. Applicants who are seeking central and state govt jobs in KIOCL can make the KIOCL Registration by using KIOCL login on or before the last date.
